title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 55329 on Dodge Ram
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 55329 custom vehicle-to-trailer wiring harness on a 1995 Dodge Ram 2500, long-bed truck.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/55329/installsheet/CME_55329_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
1995 -2003 Dodge Dakota
1995 - 2001 Dodge Ram Full-Size Truck, 6' or 8' bed

Special Notes:
All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the .  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver hitch, towing, trailer wiring, Receiver hitch wiring, Dodge Ram, curt 55329
